attributes.title: Crusty dusty disgusting
attributes.review: This app took me ALL day to download and it’s now taking all my data. I DONT recommend downloading this app. It’s making my phone very slow. Also they are sending too much at once; the caucacity to interrupt my Netflix.

attributes.title: Cheeto demon 👁👄👁
attributes.review: This app almost got me murdered I was walking minding my own business when I saw a bird hit a phone pole I look down to open my camera when boom trump 2020 pops up while this is going on a driver noticed the bird and swerved and hit me I’m not in the hospital

attributes.title: Settle for Biden 🤩
attributes.review: Worst app I’ve ever seen 🤷‍♀️ spews racist vibes as well as homophobic ones. I don’t really like to be made uncomfortable as a women but it’s apparently written into the app as a must. Something about the owner seeing it as a natural thing and something he does constantly. Anyway garbage.

attributes.title: Would not recommend 🤦🏽‍♀️
attributes.review: This app took forever to download. It only stays open for a second then crashes. It messed my phone so bad that it just glitches all the time now. Thanks a lot.

attributes.title: COMPLETE TRASH
attributes.review: The app is not worth buying. It lagged and played random explicit music that was racist and sexist. The picture quality on my cars back camera was better than this. I hope this app is removed and never seen again.

attributes.title: This app is disgusting
attributes.review: It made my phone slow and laggy it took hours to download it asked for private information and it started glitching I can find many more reasons to absolutely hate this app 1 STAR

attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: This app is only in Chinese and it took 12 weeks for it to download on my phone... once it finally downloaded it was full or Karen’s complaining about different managers. 0/10 would not recommend

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app was horrible... it took forever to download and when I did everything ran super slow... idk who the creator is but they did a horrible job... I would give it a -10 if I could.. don’t download,. Not worth it

attributes.title: If you want to keep your info safe, DONT DOWNLOAD IT!!
attributes.review: Don’t download this. You will get LOADS of viruses. I mean SO MANY. I had to buy a new phone in fear the corona virus might come out of my old one. This entire app is just a scam, and not even the real Trump 2020 app. This app is absolutely garbage.

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: Right off the bat the app TOOK 24+ hours to download👁👄👁but I understand there must be MILLIONS of Cheeto supporters trying to download at the same time so I just blew it off and opened the app AND IT PLAYED A SHRILLING JAZZ AND MY DOGS WENT WILD it made them go soooo rabid THEY KNOCKED DOWN MY FRONT DOOR this app just causes so many PROBLEMS just dont download 🧚‍♀️⚡️
